attributes.additional_details:
In 2016 the UK as a whole voted to leave the EU. 17.4 million people voted across the UK votes to leave. Not as individual countries, but one nation. 
Parliament has become a place of remainers who are ignoring the electorate, and now the people should have their say. 


It's no longer about political parties, its about remainders vs brexiteers. 
We the people are fed up with the embarrassing way this is being dealt with, and demand the standing down of all MPs to make way for a general election
attributes.background: Parliament has become a place where the electorates will is no longer represented. Democracy is being squandered. 17.4 million people and over 400 leave constituencies are being ignored. It's now time for a change.
